attributes.action: remove road tax and add this tax to the petrol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As so many people are not paying road tax the easiest solution would be to put this onto the petrol cost thereby making sure that all who use fuel are paying for the road tax. The more fuel used the more road tax is being paid.
No-one would be able to avoid paying!!
